episodes.title: How to Use Street Epistemology with Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description:
Want a different way to talk to someone about their beliefs? Street epistemology (SE) is a fantastic method to try if you haven't given it a shot before.

https://linktr.ee/thefallingtower

Links to check out:
https://streetepistemology.com/
https://streetepistemology.com/blog/using-street-epistemology-with-loved-ones
https://jwfacts.com/watchtower/helping-someone-leave.php

Anthony Magnabosco: https://www.youtube.com/c/AnthonyMagnabosco210

Conversations with LDS Members:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zv0l2LVww2I
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Alm4bD5xnCg
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uHAjeaxwBUk

Conversations with Dan:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OpwxM2wNChE
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Fe1vep7NDU

Twitter: https://twitter.com/exjwteeno
Email: thefallingtower1914@gmail.com

Chapters
00:00 - Intro
01:54 - Real life examples of SE to watch
04:18 - Points to keep in mind during the conversation
07:16 - Full list of points
07:24 - Sample questions to ask
17:26 - Full list of questions
17:34 - Outro
